transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good morning sir.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ji sir boliye sir call kiya tha aapne.
Customer: Haan nahi abhi payment dalne ke baad to aapne dekha bhi nahi idhar udhar.
Executive: Sir chutti thi na sir hamari aapko maine wapas call back bhi kiya sham ko jab dekha.
Customer: Haan chutti budhwar ko maine payment dal diya budhwar ko nahi mangalwar ko payment dala kal ka din ho gaya pura to kal thodi chutti thi.
Executive: Kal hi to chutti tha sir.
Customer: Kis cheez ka?
Executive: Sir kal Guru Nanak Jayanti tha na uska chutti tha yaha pe.
Customer: Achcha. Haan. To mai kya bol raha hu aap dekho thoda sa aapne dekha aapko call back kiya tha maine.
Executive: Kiya hai mai kya bol raha hu recording suni kya aapne?
Customer: Recording?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Nahi sir abhi to nahi sun payi hu.
Customer: Kijiye na madam suniye na abhi ye maine dal ke ho gaye kitne din dekhiye aap dekhiye kaisa aapka jo naya upgrade hua hai package isme kaise calls aa rahe hain.
Customer: Haan aur kya raha hai sir bataiye na tabhi to mai kuch sun paungi.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap aap khud hi suniye khud hi dekhiye.
Customer: Achcha aur aapne ye sab hata diya sir aap sorgam me deal karte ho kya?
Customer: Nahi I am lead kar le rahe hain. Aap batao le ke nahi le.
Executive: Sorgam ki?
Customer: Agar hota maine socha ek aad dusra le le dekh le to usi ka dikhna chalu ho gaya.
Executive: Haan yahi to hota hai na sir ki aapko apne catalog ko catalog ke andar agar aap sorgam me kam karte ho sir aapko catalog me rakhna padega nahi to sirf sorgam ki lead aapko dikhegi. Abhi aapko sorgam ki lead dikh rahi hai sirf.
Customer: Wahi to kya kare abhi batao.
Executive: Sir to ek kam kar lo na agar aap sorgam me kam karte ho to usko as a product add kar lo nahi karte ho to hata do usko negative mark kar do remove kar do jaise aapne ye chivda namkeen ho gaya aur aapka ek aur hai ye organic millet in sab ko kar rakha hai na aapne negative.
Customer: Haan. To mai kya bol raha hu mai wo to kar diya wala bhi to hata diya.
Executive: Haan hata diya hata diya dekhiye na maine mera khud ka main bhi kiya har ek isme weeds dale mere.
Customer: Aawaz nahi aa raha kya bol rahe hain.
Customer: Maine Diwali Diwali gifting hata diya har isme maine millet flakes jowar flakes sab millet cookies aur ragi biscuit jo jo main main category dal rakha hai abhi usko koi chedkhani na kare aisa mere ko lagta hai.
Executive: Sir bilkul sir main kuch nahi kar rahi hu aap jab tak nahi karoge tab tak wo aapke end se nahi hoga nahi hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi. Ye mere end se maine karne ke baad maine do teen dafa dekha hai ki kuch cheeze maine ki thi uske baad kisi ne kar diya. Nahi nahi abhi maine sab jagah maine 100% score kiya hai abhi sab isme video bhi dala hai aapne jaise kaha ki puri youtube ki video dalo dekhiye aapne. 92 ho raha hai sir aapka.
Executive: 92?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kahan pe?
Executive: Total overall score 92% aapke sare product line ka.
Customer: To 100 ke liye kya kya karna padega?
Executive: 100 ke liye jo missing hoga jaise main aapko bata deti hu kya kya cheeze missing hai.
Customer: Ye to baad me bataiye abhi thoda mai bahar hu. Dupehar me phone karta hu.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Bahar hu dupehar me phone karta hu.
Executive: Kab tak connect karu aapko sir kuch kuch sab me to 100 hai hi mere ko lagta hai ek do product me na aapne wo kiya hua hai jaise aapka ye dekho kuch me photos missing hai jaise aapka ye jwar aata hai na 1 kg organic jwar aata usme photos missing hai uske 10 number chale gaye videos missing hai organic multi millet flour ki to in sab me sir ek do ek do points missing hai video ka hi main missing hai is vajah se aapki score jo dikh rahi hai wo 928 dikh raha hai overall matlab 8% aur kam hai jis mein se kisi kisi mein sab mein to aapne 100 kiya hua hai ek do product line hai jisme aapne 88 score kiya hua hai. Isme koi problem nahi hai sir 100 me nahi bhi rahega 92 plus hai to wo bhi sahi hai kuch nahi hai aur ye sorgam ka kya karu?
Customer: Sorgam ka kya karu sir?
Customer: Nahi nikal nikal do nikal do.
Executive: Sir ye matlab hata do.
Customer: Tum usko card nikal do bas. Usko getla ka.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan. Haan. Hata do hata do. Hata do. Sir ye to sir aapko mai wahi bol raha hu dupehar ko mai mai screen share karta hu dupehar ko fir aap ye karte.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai call kariyega. Haan. Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says his profile is being edited.

- Customer wants to achieve 100% score.

- Customer wants to remove sorgam from catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive said she will not make changes.

- Executive informed about missing photos and videos.

- Executive offered to share screen in the afternoon.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in the afternoon.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, catalog, score, sorgam, product
